verses.kjv: A false balance is abomination to the LORD: but a just weight is his delight.
verses.ct: The LORD despises dishonest scales, but accurate weights bring him delight.

verses.kjv: When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.
verses.ct: When pride arrives, disgrace follows close behind, but wisdom stays with the humble.

verses.kjv: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.
verses.ct: The integrity of honest people will guide them, but the crookedness of the unfaithful will ruin them.

verses.kjv: Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.
verses.ct: Wealth is worthless on the day of judgment, but righteousness rescues a person from death.

verses.kjv: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.
verses.ct: The righteousness of a blameless person keeps their path straight, but the wicked will collapse because of their own wickedness.

verses.kjv: The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them: but transgressors shall be taken in their own naughtiness.
verses.ct: The righteousness of honest people will rescue them, but the unfaithful get trapped by their own corrupt desires.

verses.kjv: When a wicked man dieth, his expectation shall perish: and the hope of unjust men perisheth.
verses.ct: When a wicked person dies, all their hopes die too, and everything they expected from their power comes to nothing.

verses.kjv: The righteous is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked cometh in his stead.
verses.ct: The righteous person is rescued from trouble, and the wicked end up taking their place in it.

verses.kjv: An hypocrite with his mouth destroyeth his neighbour: but through knowledge shall the just be delivered.
verses.ct: A godless person uses words to destroy their neighbor, but through knowledge the righteous escape.

verses.kjv: When it goeth well with the righteous, the city rejoiceth: and when the wicked perish, there is shouting.
verses.ct: When things go well for the righteous, the whole city celebrates, and when the wicked are destroyed, people cheer.

verses.kjv: By the blessing of the upright the city is exalted: but it is overthrown by the mouth of the wicked.
verses.ct: Through the blessing of upright people a city is built up, but the words of the wicked tear it down.

verses.kjv: He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace.
verses.ct: A person who lacks sense looks down on their neighbor, but someone with real understanding keeps quiet.

verses.kjv: A talebearer revealeth secrets: but he that is of a faithful spirit concealeth the matter.
verses.ct: A gossip goes around revealing secrets, but a trustworthy person keeps confidences.

verses.kjv: Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.
verses.ct: Without good guidance, a nation falls, but there is security when there are many advisors.

verses.kjv: He that is surety for a stranger shall smart for it: and he that hateth suretiship is sure.
verses.ct: Whoever guarantees a loan for a stranger will suffer for it, but the person who refuses to put up collateral stays safe.

verses.kjv: A gracious woman retaineth honour: and strong men retain riches.
verses.ct: A gracious woman holds on to her honor, just as determined men hold on to their wealth.

verses.kjv: The merciful man doeth good to his own soul: but he that is cruel troubleth his own flesh.
verses.ct: A kind person does good for their own soul, but a cruel person brings harm on themselves.

verses.kjv: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.
verses.ct: The wicked earn deceptive wages, but the person who plants righteousness reaps a genuine reward.

verses.kjv: As righteousness tendeth to life: so he that pursueth evil pursueth it to his own death.
verses.ct: Just as righteousness leads to life, whoever chases after evil is running toward their own death.

verses.kjv: They that are of a froward heart are abomination to the LORD: but such as are upright in their way are his delight.
verses.ct: The LORD despises those with twisted hearts, but people who live with integrity are his delight.

verses.kjv: Though hand join in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.
verses.ct: You can be certain of this: the wicked will not escape punishment, but the descendants of the righteous will be set free.

verses.kjv: As a jewel of gold in a swineâ€™s snout, so is a fair woman which is without discretion.
verses.ct: A beautiful woman who lacks good judgment is like a gold ring stuck in a pig's nose.

verses.kjv: The desire of the righteous is only good: but the expectation of the wicked is wrath.
verses.ct: What the righteous desire leads only to good, but what the wicked expect ends in fury.

verses.kjv: There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth; and there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth to poverty.
verses.ct: Some people give freely and end up gaining even more; others hold back what they should give and only grow poorer.

verses.kjv: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.
verses.ct: A generous person will prosper, and whoever refreshes others will be refreshed in return.

verses.kjv: He that withholdeth corn, the people shall curse him: but blessing shall be upon the head of him that selleth it.
verses.ct: People curse the one who hoards grain, but they speak blessings over the one who is willing to sell it.

verses.kjv: He that diligently seeketh good procureth favour: but he that seeketh mischief, it shall come unto him.
verses.ct: Whoever earnestly pursues what is good gains favor, but whoever goes looking for trouble will find it.

verses.kjv: He that trusteth in his riches shall fall; but the righteous shall flourish as a branch.
verses.ct: Anyone who puts their trust in wealth will fall, but the righteous will thrive like green leaves.

verses.kjv: He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind: and the fool shall be servant to the wise of heart.
verses.ct: Whoever brings ruin on their own family will inherit nothing but wind, and a fool will end up serving the wise.

verses.kjv: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; and he that winneth souls is wise.
verses.ct: The fruit of a righteous life is like a tree of life, and a person who wins souls is wise.

verses.kjv: Behold, the righteous shall be recompensed in the earth: much more the wicked and the sinner.
verses.ct: Consider this: if the righteous receive what they deserve here on earth, how much more will the wicked and the sinner!
